name: granola-search
description: Search and query your Granola meeting notes with natural language. Filter by attendees, dates, content, and workspaces.

GRANOLA_SYNC_DIR.description: Path to synced Granola documents directory (required)

tools.name: search_meetings
tools.description: Search Granola meetings with natural language queries. Supports filtering by attendees (email), date ranges (with relative dates like 'last week'), workspaces, folders, and content search in titles and transcripts.

attendee_email.description: Filter by attendee email (partial match supported)

start_date.description: Start date - supports ISO8601 or relative dates (e.g., 'last week', 'yesterday')

end_date.description: End date - supports ISO8601 or relative dates

folder_name.description: Filter by folder name (partial match supported)

content_query.description: Search in meeting titles and transcripts

include_transcript.description: Include full transcript in results (default: false)

tools.name: get_meeting_details
tools.description: Get full details for a specific meeting by document ID, including notes and metadata

document_id.description: The document ID of the meeting

tools.name: get_meeting_transcript
tools.description: Get the formatted transcript for a specific meeting

document_id.description: The document ID of the meeting

tools.name: refresh_cache
tools.description: Reload Granola cache file to pick up new meeting attendees without restarting the server

prerequisites: Documents synced via 'bun run main' command
